query:
SELECT 
  facility, 
  product, 
  Count(device) TEST, 
  Round(sum(CASE WHEN device_fm = 'PASS' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) PASS,
  Count(device) - Round(sum(CASE WHEN device_fm = 'PASS' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) diff 


FROM (
  SELECT device, facility, product, device_fm, state 
  FROM pkg.screen_test 
  where end_dt > sysdate -11/24 
    and product = 'LR4-TOSA'
    and state = 'C'
    
)
GROUP BY facility, product  

UNION ALL 


SELECT 
  facility asdkjfvzdfvjz, 
  product, 
  Count(device) TEST, 
  Round(sum(CASE WHEN device_fm = 'PASS' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) PASS,
  Count(device) - Round(sum(CASE WHEN device_fm = 'PASS' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) diff


FROM (
  SELECT device, facility, product, device_fm, state 
  FROM pkg.screen_test_rosa 
  where end_dt > sysdate -11/24 
    and product = 'LR4-ROSA'
    and state = 'C'
    
)
GROUP BY facility, product
